featured.text: The tines prevented meat from twisting or moving during carving and allowed food to slide off more easily than it would with a knife.
The doors of these department stores slide open _____ when you approach them.

definition.zh_def: 滑動，滑行；使某物在表面上移動
definition.en_def: To move smoothly along a surface while maintaining continuous contact with it.
definition.example: The children love to slide down the playground slide.
